entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
